testcase.name: Verifying adactin booking order with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the adactin page...........................................passed When Login into the adactin hotel homepage using "karthi007" and "Karthi@1989".passed And Search hotel by selecting "Adelaide","Hotel Hervey","Deluxe" and search.passed Then Select hotel using select..............................................passed And Book the hotel using "Vignesh","Viki","Chennai","1456786534569876",selectCreditCardType,"May","2022","678"and Book Now.passed Then User should verify success message.....................................passed
